# MVP 

```{r}
library(tidytext)
library(janeaustenr)
library(tidyverse)
library(textdata)

```

```{r}
ja_books <- list(prideprejudice, sensesensibility)
both_ja_books <- purrr::map_chr(ja_books, paste, collapse = " ")
both_ja_books <- paste(both_ja_books, collapse = " ")

```

```{r}
sensibility_pride <- tibble(
  id = 1:length(both_ja_books),
  text = both_ja_books
) %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word,text)

```


```{r}
sensibility_pride %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)


sensibility_pride %>% 
  anti_join(stop_words) %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)


```
```{r}
# most common sentiment words 

austen_sentiments <- sensibility_pride %>%
  inner_join(get_sentiments("bing"))

austen_sentiments %>%
  filter(sentiment == "positive") %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE)

austen_sentiments %>%
  filter(sentiment == "negative") %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE)


```
